author: Glenn Fung and M. Murat Dundar and Jinbo Bi and Bharat Rao
title: A fast iterative algorithm for fisher discriminant using heterogeneous kernels
window: p-values obtained show that there is no significant difference between A-KFD and the the standard KFD where the kernel model is chosen using a cross-validation tuning procedure.
